{isProfile.name} {isProfile.email}
Keluar
{dataDocs.map((doc, idx) => ( ))}
No. Car Color Action

{filterBill.map((item, idx) => (

{`[${idx}]`}{` => `}{item.body.DENOM}

))} ) } export default Dashboard
